text: Marcos Aurélio Titon (born 19 July 1976), known as Marcão, is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a Defender and Midfielder for Luxembourg National Division club FC Jeunesse Canach. ==References== ==External links== * * *Official FC Jeunesse Canach website 2016/17 season players Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:People from Paraná (state) Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:S.C. title: Marcão (footballer, born 1976)
